Carl Yuheng Ren

Computer Vision Researcher, PhD

Email Github Youtube

Bio

I’m a research scientist in Fyusion, Inc., a SF based startup company specialized in spatial photography, above is an example of our fyu.se app. Before joining Fyusion, I worked as a Postdoc research fellow in the Oxford Torr Vision Group with Professor Phil Torr. From 2010-2014, I did my DPhil (Oxford Ph.D) in Active Vision Group, University of Oxford under then supervision of Professor Ian Reid and Professor David Murray.From 2006-2010 I studied in Harbin Institute of Technology, where I received a BSc in Computer Science and Technology. My research interest involves solving real-time computer vision problems, including 3D tracking and reconstruction with modern GPU.
CV(EN), CV(CN)

News

  • Aug. 2015: LibISR: real-time 3D model-based tracking, has a public release now on GitHub.
  • July. 2015: Our paper “Very High Frame Rate Volumetric Integration of Depth Images on Mobile Devices” got accepted by ISMAR 2015.
